newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle roundup - USDA.

text.p: USDA said trade was slow late Monday. Slaughter steers and heifers were not well established, few sales finished firm.

Inquiry was moderate, demand was light except late moderate. Sales confirmed on 1,700 slaughter steers and 2,300 slaughter heifers. For the week to date including late Friday and the weekend 7,800 head confirmed.

Steers - few select with end choice and select and choice 2-3 1150-1200 lbs including cutting bulls and Longhorn cross and few Holsteins 65.00-68.00; load Select and Choice 2-3 1175 lbs Holsteins 60.00.

Heifers - select and choice 2-3 950-1050 lbs 68.00; few select with end choice 1100 lbs 68.00; few mixed commercial to choice 1225-1240 lb heifers and heiferettes 67.00. confirmed: 4000 last week: none last year: none
week to date: 7800 last week: 600 last year: 2000
